
add_custom_command (
  OUTPUT  VAudioSamplePacket.cpp
          VAudioSamplePacket.h
          VAudioSamplePacket__Syms.cpp
          VAudioSamplePacket__Syms.h
  DEPENDS AudioSamplePacket.v
  COMMAND perl ${VERILATOR} ${VERILATOR_OPTS} -Mdir ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR} -cc
    ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/AudioSamplePacket.v
)

# Verilog .v files are added here so that they get added to any IDE project generated by CMake.
add_library (VAudioSamplePacket STATIC VAudioSamplePacket.cpp VAudioSamplePacket__Syms.cpp
    AudioSamplePacket.v
)

target_compile_options(VAudioSamplePacket PRIVATE ${VK_CPPFLAGS})

target_include_directories(VAudioSamplePacket PUBLIC ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR})

target_link_libraries(VAudioSamplePacket verilated)
